wikibase-after-page-delete: Ya kamata a cire mahaɗar wannan shafin daga [$1 abunda ya cuɗanya {{WBREPONAME}} item]. Zamuce Ku duba ko wannan ya faru
wikibase-after-page-delete-queued: Da [$1 {{WBREPONAME}} abu] mai alaƙa da wannan shafin za a sabunta shi ta atomatik. Lura cewa wannan bazai faru nan take ba
wikibase-comment-remove: An goge abin da aka haɗa {{WBREPONAME}}. An cire hanyoyin haɗin harshe.
wikibase-comment-linked: An haɗa wani abu {{WBREPONAME}} zuwa wannan shafin.
wikibase-comment-unlink: An cire wannan shafin daga abun {{WBREPONAME}}. An cire hanyoyin haɗin harshe.
wikibase-comment-restore: Abunda aka haɗa {{WBREPONAME}} ba a goge su ba. An maido hanyoyin haɗin harshe.
wikibase-comment-sitelink-change: An canza mahaɗar harshen daga $1 zuwa $2
wikibase-linkitem-alreadylinked: Shafin da kake son haɗawa da shi an riga an haɗe shi zuwa [$1 abu] akan babban wurin ajiyar bayanai wanda ke danganta [[$2]] akan wannan rukunin yanar gizon. Abubuwa na iya samun shafi ɗaya kacal a kowane rukunin yanar gizo da aka haɗe. Da fatan za a zaɓi wani shafi daban don haɗawa.
wikibase-linkitem-close: Rufe maganganun sai a sake loda shafin
wikibase-linkitem-failure: An sami kuskure da ba a sani ba yayin ƙoƙarin haɗa shafin da aka bayar.
wikibase-linkitem-failed-modify: An kasa haɗa shafuka: an kasa haɗa abubuwan da suka dace akan {{WBREPONAME}}.
wikibase-replicationnote: Yi hakuri!ka sani zai dauki dakikoki kafin masu shafin su ga sauye-sayen
